website_summaries.verdict: A waterproof option that produces stunning, natural-looking lashes that stay soft all day.
pros: Available in a pack of 1 or 2
Leaves lashes feeling soft and natural
Easily applied to bottom lashes without smearing
Stays perfectly in place at the gym, pool, or in the rain
cons: Dries out faster than other brands

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't rub off!
customer_reviews.text: I used to only wear water-proof mascara, but it was such a pain to take off. And I wouldn't wear any other kind because it always rubbed off throughout the day, and I don't know I'm just not a huge fan of having mascara all over my face. But I bought this because I figured it was worth a shot, and even though it isn't water-proof, it STAYS. All day! And I have pretty long eyelashes, so usually I get black marks under my eyebrows, but not with this mascara! Plus my lashes are very soft! Not stiff at all. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: dezondra

customer_reviews.title: Mascara I love!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I finally found a mascara I don't hate! I actually love this stuff & it's awesome! It goes on smoothly, no clumping or smudging. I've loved it since I got it, but the thing that prompted this review is that I put my makeup on (including mascara) yesterday morning, fell asleep before I could wash my face & at 9pm TODAY finished a full workout at the gym - weights & 45 minutes on the elliptical & mascara looks great! Obviously doesn't look like I just put it on, but considering what its been through I couldn't be more impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Mascara for Older Ladies
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara but it is getting almost impossible to find in local stores. I'm so glad that Amazon has it available. I've used this for years and love how it doesn't run, thickens lashes, is non- irritating and is easy to remove with lotion. I'm at that stage in life (68) where I use no makeup except mascara. As one gets older, lashes tend to look nonexistent. It is nice to give my lashes a little subtle color when I go out without looking garish.
customer_reviews.author: Blue DragonflyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have dry eyes and also wear contacts, thus making the use of restasis (prescription eye drops necessary........ironically, sometimes causing my eyes to tear too much). This waterproof mascara is a Godsend, my mascara almost always stays put and is easily applied, even on lower lashes. I find it's easily removed by using Almay gentle oil free eye makeup remover pads. (Another hint I've learned is to use waterproof eyeliner, when using restasis)
customer_reviews.author: Carolee Meek

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected....more for a natural look.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sticking with Stiletto by Maybelline. This Full and Soft Mascara is fine for the very natural look, but it doesn't add volume and for that, I knock off some stars. Not what I expected based on previous reviews. I like my lashes to look slightly unnaturally long, like falsies, so this didn't do it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara on the market
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is amazing. I've been using this product for 10+ years and I will never use anything else. I've tried premium brands such as Clinique, Too Faced, and Urban Decay mascaras and I always come back to this one. It does a great job at making my lashes look fuller and longer, without making them look clumpy. It truly is water proof and you will need to use a remover to get it off. I can't tell you how much I love this mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Coats nicely
customer_reviews.text: The brush is a little big so I have to keep a q-tip handy to wipe all the smudges I get applying, but it goes on easily and coats nicely. It lasts all day. I have fallen asleep with it on and it just starts to flake a little, not crazy black eyes when I wake up. It is a new bottle so can start out a little thick, so makes clumps in my lashes that I have to use a separate brush to smooth out. Overall I do like it though.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: So Far Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: After Revlon Mascara caused an allergic reaction, I became a department store mascara snob (at least I can admit it)! So I begrudging tried this, and to my surprise, it is pretty great. I have only used it a couple of times, but thus far it has nicely lengthened and separated. I cannot say it is a big volume mascara; hence the double layer method will be needed (apply one coat first, then go in with a second coat on back and front of lashes). Nonetheless, it does lengthen and for the price...I really like.
customer_reviews.author: KGRoo

customer_reviews.title: Seriously, the best mascara ever. Helps prevent lash breakage!
customer_reviews.text: I'm showing you a picture of my lashes without the mascara in order to show you how awesome it is. I switched to this soft mascara about 7 years ago, but it only took a few months of use to really see positive results. Using the soft mascara stopped lash breakage and helped my lashes regrow and they are incredibly full. I have never used any lash regrowth seurums. Seriously, the best mascara ever.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Terrific mascara--natural-looking lashes
customer_reviews.text: This may actually be in the top 2 or 3 mascaras I have ever used. I am middle aged and have always had longish lashes, but they're thinning out as I get older. This mascara lengthens and gives a bit of thickness, but not a fake-looking amount. It just makes my lashes look like better versions of themselves. It looks very natural and stays on all day, but I do notice that it smudges a bit under my eyes sometimes (I wear an under-eye concealer), so I have to keep an eye on that, so to speak. So few mascaras actually do what the marketing department puts in the name. This one actually does make lashes full and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Dr W

customer_reviews.title: Tried and True!
customer_reviews.text: I used Maybelline Full 'N Soft mascara consistently for years back in the day, then I was lured away by pricier brands and numerous sample mascaras from my Ipsy bags. After struggling with smudging and flaking from all these "fancy" mascaras, I remembered my old friend, Maybelline Full 'N Soft. Even with more and more samples coming in, I still reach for my old friend most every morning nowadays. No smudges, no flaking, and it is what the name says, Full 'N Soft. Thanks to Subscribe and Save, I'll never be without my old friend MF'NS again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Bee

customer_reviews.title: I love this mascara and have been using it for years
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara and have been using it for years. It does provide volume and does not clump like others. I keep trying all these new volume mascaras offered by other companies and always come back to this one. Maybelline please don't discontinue this one.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie B

customer_reviews.title: My go-to mascara for over 10 years
customer_reviews.text: Great texture, no clumps, flexible eyelashes, the absolute best wand in anyone's mascara line and very important to me, easily washed off with water and a gentle facial liquid soap. Not for an over-the-top look, though. Choose this for a natural/office look.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Duke

customer_reviews.title: Full and SOFT
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years, love it because it's waterproof, tends not to smudge except with crazy physical activity/swimming, but it comes off reasonably easily. And it doesn't turn your lashes into sticks/hard pointy objects. I have very sensitive eyes, and will happily trade slightly less spidery lashes for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: My main mascara for many years
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this since I was a teenager in the 00's, occasionally trying other kinds but always coming back to this one. The consistency and brush design make it go on pretty smoothly and easily without clumping much. The volume/length difference is immediately visible. My lashes stay healthy and flexible, no breakage. I get the washable version, but it still stays on fairly well until I want it off.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Nevil

customer_reviews.title: My favorite waterproof mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I will try other mascaras to see if I'm missing out on something, but I keep coming back to my tried and true favorite. It gives my lashes a fuller and more defined look, and it's never flaky. I like that it removes easily waterproof eye makeup remover pads; some waterproof mascaras are so hard to remove that you end up pulling out precious lashes, but not this one. I hope Maybelline never stops making this!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mackowiak

customer_reviews.title: Natural look and great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. I have used it for many years. It’s lightweight and holds my curled eyelashes upright all day. I like the fact that this mascara looks natural and is less likely to clump during application. I bought on Amazon for the best price compared to Walgreens and CVS.
customer_reviews.author: Theoneandonly

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a waterproof mascara that doesn't have fallout and won't break the bank, this is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several types and brands of mascara and this is by far my favorite. It has the least fallout throughout the day. It is waterproof for my watery sensitive eyes. The price is perfect. I love the applicator, it does a great job at separating my lashes and the mascara itself doesn't look clumpy and heavy. It lasts all day. Occasionally I apply another coat if I am going out at night but I find that is normal with any mascara I use.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Better than the "best"
customer_reviews.text: I have been an avid Covergirl LashBlast user for over 6 years. Recently, I've been annoyed with the flaking of that product and decided to venture out. My first impression of this was that I didn't like it. After a few uses, I realized that the best way to use this mascara is to curl your lashes BEFORE using it to avoid any of it rubbing off or making a mess when you blink. It has been a refreshing transition because I will say that this product makes my lashes look much longer, does not clump, and feels weightless. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Howard

customer_reviews.title: I now wear contacts and this stuff is lovely❤ No clumping or flaking, just pretty💐
customer_reviews.text: I'm a new contact wearer so of course..went on the search for good safe mascara! Seriously, for the first time in my life, I can say I put mascara on that didn't clump my eyelashes together after a second coat lol a Eureka moment for sure 😂💐🙃 Love it!! And yes, for sure would recommend 👍
customer_reviews.author: Just Rosie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this mascara for years and every time I try another product I end up throwing it out and going back to this. It goes on well, doesn’t clump or flake and is fairly easy to remove. It defines the lashes without being over-dramatic, and you can apply a second coat for greater effect. I usually warm the bottle by tucking it into my clothes while I put on my eyeshadow before using it.
customer_reviews.author: Elly

customer_reviews.title: My go-to mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara because it's so easy to take off at night, yet it doesn't come off during wear. I never understood the whole waterproof craze. Removing waterproof mascara is a nightmare and I typically lose a lash or two every time I wear it. This mascara is super gentle and very buildable, so I can either go light and natural with it, or apply 2-3 coats for a fuller look. And it washes off in seconds with a little bit of face wash. Highly recommend - I hope they never discontinue this mascara!
customer_reviews.author: JessicaG

customer_reviews.title: Came and was old!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand...and cannot ever find it in the stores anymore...thought ordering online would work but it was very clumpy...so probably very old!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good mascara
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite mascaras. It adds volume and definition all at once!! Great price for a decent mascara and it's cheaper here than in stores. Give it a try. Its such a great drug store mascara. I have bought smashbox and benefit mascaras that don't even compare to this one and this is a fraction of the price of the high end ones.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: Very good for eyes with allergies to other mascaras
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is allergic to all other mascaras we have tried for her. I was doing a google search and a lot of people with eye allergies and sensitive eyes suggested this mascara. And, it is absolutely amazing. My daughter has zero sensitivity to this mascara and can wear it all day, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I decided to try this mascara on a whim because of all the good reviews, they were right. This mascara is great. It separates and provides volume without any clumps. I am a convert. I have bought this now several times and will continue. The brush is I think a big part of the success of this mascara as it’s large enough to get almost all your lashes Ana it’s got real bristles, unlike many plastic brushes these days (which I loathe).
customer_reviews.author: Erica Ulin

customer_reviews.title: Comes off easy... Too easy, too soon.
customer_reviews.text: They changed their formula. This used to be so great!! But now it it almost too natural. Not much volume or length. It doesn’t clump too much so that’s good. But the worst part now is that it really smudges and flakes and just comes off. Within an hour it looks like I need to reapply. But did not used to be the case- it used to give you full soft lashes that would last at least half a day. The waterproof version stays longer but is more clumpy and I don’t like it as much from the get-go.
customer_reviews.author: Zuzoom

customer_reviews.title: The only mascara I use
customer_reviews.text: I've tried lots of kinds of mascara at all price points, I just keep coming back to this one. It's my old reliable go-to. The brush does a great job of coating every lash, and it builds volume beautifully. It stays soft and doesn't make your lashes look/feel rigid. I've not tried it with false lashes before, so I can't speak to that. I've never had a problem with it flaking or smudging or irritating my eyes. I'm glad that I've found an inexpensive drug-store brand that does the trick without costing a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof but needs many coats
customer_reviews.text: I bought and wore this for my brother’s wedding. As far as being waterproof, it really is! Sometimes a shower with some rubbing will make other waterproof mascara come off but not this one! I needed to use a makeup wipe with remover on it to get it off (since none came off in the shower). Reason I deducted a star was that it was fairly light and require MULTIPLE coats (like 5-10 coats) to make my eyelashes look full and how I wanted them to for the wedding.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Mascara
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mascara! It doesn't clump; it's easy to apply. You can put on several coats to make your lashes thicker, but it won't have a "soft" look. A couple little zig-zags is good. I have to replace mine 7-8 months, and I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Estrella

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!! Once for a nice look, twice for a dramatic look. Always a natural look. ;)
customer_reviews.text: I hope they never stop selling this make of mascara, but I would love to see it in a dark brown like they use to have. Can't find it anywhere anymore :(
customer_reviews.author: 2ChromeEyes

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Best drugstore and well all around mascara. I’ve pretty much tried every mascara on the market...cheapest to expensive and IMO this is the best!! I never have clumps...my lashes are always nicely separated, long and full. Every once in a while it’ll smudge under my eyes (all mascaras I’ve tried do even waterproof) but that’s if I forget to powder my lashes before applying or if it’s super humid out. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cara Doran

customer_reviews.title: Dried out. Maybe an old package.
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase this at Target and I love it. The one I purchased on Amazon is really dry and not the same quality. Maybe is an old package I'm not sure. Will not be purchasing again from Amazon. Will go to the store.
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: No soft
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mascara because I wanted one that felt soft on my lashes. I have long lashes naturally so I wasn't looking for something thickening or voluminous, just something to slightly enhance my lashes while still keeping them natural and soft. This isn't it! It made my lashes HARD like weird feeling hard. I had to scrub to get it off causing some lashes to come out every time. It's terrible.
customer_reviews.author: lbuff

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: This didn't really do any differently then anything else ive used. But i have thin lashes and it would probably take falsies and some very high dollar mascara to achieve full long lashes so i don't think its this mascara. Although it was a little difficult to remove all of it buy other then that, its affordable, the black doesn't fade it stays bold like youve just applied it, goes on smooth and evenly and i do believethis would look amazing on full lashes. I would recommend for med to full lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie

customer_reviews.title: Raccoon eyes
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this makes my lashes look, unfortunately within 10-15 minutes of applying ( only on TOP lashes) there’s so much black smudge under my eyes I look like a raccoon! It’s awful! I tried it out for a week and every single time the raccoon effect happened. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Not what it used to be.
customer_reviews.text: This used to be my favorite mascara for years and years. It separates and lengthens like no other. I’ve found that my last few tubes cause a terrible case of raccoon eyes, and I don’t even have watery eyes! Such a shame! Made the splurge and switched to roller lash and I’m glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Happy lashes!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mascara for years! Love it! It's waterproof & stays on! The best feature of this mascara is that your eyelashes stay soft. I have tried other waterproof types of mascara & they have made my lashes brittle & the mascara flakes off. This does not happen with this brand & never has! I will continue to use this brand for as long as they make it!
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Coast Gal

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a daily mascara
customer_reviews.text: It does have a nice thick brush that separates the lashes well and it gives some volume, not much length. It works for an everyday mascara but it does flake some and it is a little hard to remove with soap and water. Makeup remover works well. It seemed somewhat dry not sure if it had dried out some or if it is just a dryer formula. Not sure if I would buy it again. I need something that gives me more length, I have short lashes.
customer_reviews.author: LCM

customer_reviews.title: No to the hydra fuge version!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered maybelline full and soft waterproof mascara in a two pack . I have real good success with it ! However I received one full and soft and one named full and soft” hydra fuge” it was terrible . I couldn’t understand what had happened to a mascara that had worked so well! Until I checked the label on the one I was using. Opened the other package that was plainly titled full and soft waterproof mascara!. Wella!!!! There it was , my mascara is back! I won’t ever buy the “ hydra fuge version.
customer_reviews.author: L.T.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, subtle appearance
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly long lashes and wear glasses, so I hate clumpy mascara that makes my lashes hard and scrape against my lenses. This stuff is pretty great. It's soft and separates my lashes well without being too much. It can smudge if you're doing unreasonable mascara wearing activities, but it can also be tough to remove if you don't like harsh make up removers. I've found a bit of coconut oil takes care of business. I will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for thin, sparse lashes
customer_reviews.text: Meh! I have thin, sparse lashes and, after three applications, I could barely tell that I had mascara on at all. This mascara may work for those with thicker lashes but I would not advise for anyone with lashes like mine.
customer_reviews.author: LindaKTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Better than expensive brands that supposedly work, worth every penny and more
customer_reviews.text: For years, I've been trying to find mascara that gives my thin, short lashes more volume without all the smudging, clumping, and uneven coating. I am not a mascara expert, but this stuff works! Up until now, I was using Chanel(which is a great brand, but burns a huge hole in my wallet). Not only did this Maybelline mascara cost less—it offered much more as a product in general. It gave me length, volume, and softness that I could never achieve before with other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny A.

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy and heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I get this product all the time but decided to go through Amazon this time. This time the product is clumpy, too heavy and no matter how hard I try to fix it, it is impossible. I love this product. But I assume I received an "old" product or something happened in the shipping. I won't get it online again. SR
customer_reviews.author: The Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Go to mascara for a natural look
customer_reviews.text: I prefer a softly defined lash that isn’t super long because those smudge my glasses. This is long enough to make my eyes pop even behind glasses without excessive length or a long, messy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special and smells strange
customer_reviews.text: Smells like motor oil that made me leary it was the actual product advertised i didnt notice it until using it for a while, but luckily it did not irritate my eyes. It was just ok. It did not remove any easier than any other mascara. Nothing special about it. I went back to my other brand i liked better.
customer_reviews.author: Reg Paddington

customer_reviews.title: Grainy and little chunks all through it! Had to throw it away!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't use this product at all because it was full of little chunks and grainy. It reminded me of mascara that is too old, because of the little bits it left all over my eyelashes, but it was still liquid enough so I new it wasn't old. Just a bad product? If I had bought it at a store, I would have insisted on my money back, but makeup apparently is not returnable on Amazon. I just threw it away. What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft
customer_reviews.text: Makes lashes look soft, not clumpy. Very light weight feel. I usually purchase Neutrogena volume mascara, but thought I'd try this formula instead. Decent product for the price. Removing is a little more difficult than what I'm used to. I come out of the shower with raccoon eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Most Natural and Soft Eyelashes.. no joke
customer_reviews.text: I like to wear Mascara, but not have it look obvious that I’m wearing any. This is by far the only mascara I’ve found that provides great coverage on every lash separating them naturally and without clumping. I’ve tried both the waterproof and non, and both are fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: S. Avery

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I like this mascara. For the price it works really well. It also is easy to remove with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: Lwag

customer_reviews.title: The Name of this product tells it all
customer_reviews.text: I do not wear makeup but every now and then I will wear mascara. I have always suffered when I wore mascara because it is so heavy and feels like I am wearing weights on my lashes. So i only wore it on very special occasions. I decided to try this product just because of the name and the name tells you everything about this product. This is the only mascara I can wear that does not clump, make my eyes feel heavy or tired, and still gives me the volume I am looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Grams X3

customer_reviews.title: My go to mascara
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this mascara for years. I didn’t realize it was favored by those with sensitive skin/eyes, until I tried another brand when I couldn’t find this in the store. The other brand immediately made my eyes burn. Luckily I found this here! I like that it doesn’t make your lashes feel crunchy or stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Elmo

customer_reviews.title: Holds for about 4 hours!
customer_reviews.text: Not too happy with this mascara any longer. I have used it for years but in the last few it seems to have changed. It leaves black marks under my eyes, is hard to remove and is super clumpy about 3 weeks in. I don't know what changed but I want my old mascara back! So unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: This is what I've been looking for--a mascara that doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This is what I've been looking for--a mascara that doesn't irritate my contact-lens-wearing eyes, washes off with soap and water, and doesn't make my lashes fall out. This is the first mascara I've used that doesn't seem to damage my lashes. My only complaint is that it gets clumpy as the tube runs low.
customer_reviews.author: S.B. Moody

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: This is some of the best mascara I have ever used I've been using this for as long as I've work make up somewhere around over 20 years. The brush is awsome.it separated the lashes and makes them look great. I do just wish they still had the black/brown but they dont
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: This product does exactly what they said and more!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING! I would recommend it to any every day mascara wearing person. I will admit I was skeptical about this, but it is awesome! The product makes your lashes look long with out making them clumpy like some mascaras do. I have long eye lashes to begin with and mine were even longer to the point they even almost touched my eye brows. I got asked if they were fake and I said NO! Then I got asked what product I used and my friends were amazed! So now my friends are going to buy this product and try it. Thank you for making an amazing product!! ABSOLUTELY AMAZING...
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: It is dry. Too dried out for a new item.
customer_reviews.text: Dry. Very dry considering it was freshly purchased & opened. I wish had listened to the other reviewers who wrote that it was like this. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Campanile

customer_reviews.title: Burns eyes like crazy
customer_reviews.text: This mascara burns like crazy if it gets wet. My eyes were watering the other day due to allergies and the stinging was terrible! The other day I happy cried a bit and the same thing happened. Really terrible when you’re driving and have no way to relieve the burn!
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Washes off perfectly but doesn’t keep Asian lashes curled
customer_reviews.text: I have straight Asian lashes and after reading another review saying this mascara could keep Asian lashes curled - I tried it out. It definitely does not. Disappointed in that. I will keep using it for now because I do love the fact that it washes off without any issue at all. Four stars because it does what is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: mascara
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many mascaras over the last year and I tried this one because of article I read. Didn't like it at all. Had to put on like four coats and you still couldn't see my lashes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old faithful!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my go-to old faithful mascaras every time a new one falls flat and disappoints me. I love how flexible the lashes stay and you can reapply for more dramatic effect at any time during the day if you'd like and the lashes are pliable and take on the additional mascara beautifully without clumping or looking old. It also does not flake or lose it's 'umph' throughout the day. This is a fantastic mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Gracious

customer_reviews.title: Great "first mascara" or when wearing little makeup
customer_reviews.text: I love the soft, more natural look of this mascara. It's never clumped for me, and it looks fine even when it's the only makeup on my face, or when I've just used a lightly tinted sunscreen. It enhances my eyelashes very nicely without looking like "too much." It would be a great "first mascara" for a tween / teen.
customer_reviews.author: Psyphyr

customer_reviews.title: This is still my favorite. It lengthens lashes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried so many expensive brands of mascara, from Clinique to Estée Lauder to Younique. Too many to count. This is still my favorite. It lengthens lashes, but they are also perfectly separated. No clumps, I repeat no clumps! People always comment about my naturally long lashes. They aren’t. It’s the mascara.
customer_reviews.author: NAO

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Best mascara ever. Goes on thin but sticks like a light glue (in a good way). No clumps. It’s awesome
customer_reviews.author: Joci McCann

customer_reviews.title: Soft and flake free
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mascara for years. I have tried others but nothing has been as good. My lashes look full and feel soft. The Mascara does not flake or smudge. I take my makeup off with natural baby wipes and it does remove this mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hilts

customer_reviews.title: The best drugstore mascara out there
customer_reviews.text: Love this. This is so gentle and does not irritate my sensitive eyes at all. Gives good coverage and is easy to remove. Does not smudge whatsoever on me. I’ve use lots of very expensive ones that does. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: donnahc

customer_reviews.title: Irritated my Eyes
customer_reviews.text: This irritated my eyes almost like it was flaking off and getting into my eye and scratching it. It happened on three separate occasions after wearing before I finally figured out what was causing it. It looks fine, but obviously I can't continue to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, remove, but not long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a mascara that was gentle on my lashes and this one certainly is, but it flakes. So yes, looks good short term, but after several hours you can see flakes and a bit of a smudge (and I don't even use mascara on my lower lashes). Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Cet

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to its name!
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is definitely “ full and soft.” No clumping or stiffness. It also makes my lashes look natural and long without looking fake.Will put this on my “subscribe and save” list!
customer_reviews.author: J Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Voluminous and easy to wash off!
customer_reviews.text: Super light, but helps create voluminous lashes. It washes off super easy, which I like but just have to be mindful of rubbing eyes or touching them as the mascara will come off easily. No issues with smudging throughout the day
customer_reviews.author: Eweezy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara- have been using it for over a decade and have never found one I liked more! I have very thin, straight eyelashes and most mascaras weigh them down even after curling. The waterproof formulation of this keeps then curled! It is not a dramatic mascara and is great for every day use!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: This is REALLY GOOD MASCARA!
customer_reviews.text: I had to stop using Maybelline Great Lash because I was allergic to it and a website suggested this. I'm not allergic to this and it looks AMAZING! I have a new mascara! IMPRESSIVE! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: BJ Berry

customer_reviews.title: Safe for sensitive eyes, cheap, and ok for length
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive eyes and most drug store mascaras cause irritation and burning, so i was a little skeptical before purchasing. However, this mascara didn’t bother my eyes at all. It is very easy to wash off which i liked. It isn’t the best mascara, it does clump a little, and it doesn’t give much volume, but for the very low price i didn’t expect much. It served its purpose, i just needed a cheap mascara that wouldn’t burn my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail mascara
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mascara of all time! I also use MAC, Lancôme, Benefit, Dior, and other high end mascara but honestly this one is more natural looking and keeps your lashes soft and separated. No crunchy sticky lashes! Because it's waterproof, make sure you use an oil based cleanser and it'll be very easy to remove. I hope they never discontinue this mascara!!!
customer_reviews.author: LA/NYC shopper

customer_reviews.title: A good deal and performing product for contact lens wearers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was recommended for use with contact lenses. No irritation or allergies to this mild formula! Covers my lashes nicely and comes off easily with coconut oil ( my favorite eye makeup remover)!
customer_reviews.author: Terri H.

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: It was like I received a used bottle. There wasn’t much in there or I really don’t care for this formula. It barely applies anything, very hard to build up the lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Humble BeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Makes my lashes so pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Full and Soft for years now and I really like the way it makes my eyelashes look. Very fanned out and dark but not clumpy which is great. This is the waterproof version which I've only bought one of. I typically go for the non-waterproof one which I think I might like a little better just because it's easier to take off at the end of the day. Since you're supposed to replace your mascara every three months I don't see any reason why I should spend more than $10 on a tube! Of all the drugstore brands this one is definitely my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Granados

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smudge but lacks volume claims
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't smudge which is great. Easy to remove but for a mascara claims for volume, it lacks. I have had others do much better which is a disappointment but it was a great price when purchased.
customer_reviews.author: JESSIE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mascara for me!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a natural looking stays on all day until it easily washes off at night mascara... this is it.. Perfect brush, No glops, no need to “clean up” unsightly clumps. For me, it’s perfect☺️ Thank you Mabelline & thank you Pharmapacks for making it available on Amazon,
customer_reviews.author: LulaLam

customer_reviews.title: Very good product... Good price.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for quite some time. I like that it stays on all day without smudging yet I can get it off with make up remover. Although it doesn’t stay on well when swimming.
customer_reviews.author: DE

customer_reviews.title: My all-time favorite
customer_reviews.text: Use a tissue to wipe excess off brush upon each opening and you'll get soft feathery lashes. You'll go through more that way, but at this price point, it's well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: KMHS

customer_reviews.title: It is dried out upon opening. It is application ...
customer_reviews.text: It is dried out upon opening. It is application produces full and soft lashe as promised, but the product started smudging after 5 hours of normal indoor wear.
customer_reviews.author: Serene

customer_reviews.title: NOT WASHABLE, but otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I've been using this for years, but after I purchased the last tube of this, I found that it no longer washes off as it once did. It only washes off about 50% and comes off in flakes when washing (using the same cleanser as I did before). I have to finish with an oily remover. It never did that before, so I'm assuming it was a change of formula. This is still a fantastic mascara in every other way, but the washability was one of the reasons I bought this over other products. They need to remove the "washable" labeling. OLD REVIEW: As good as any expensive mascara I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Robin H.

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy/Look for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the best mascara made! I have tried several friends from drug store to cosmetics counter and I just can’t get the same look. If you can find this stock up! Well worth the cost. Get the waterproof as it’s stays put! Gives you great lashes without making it look like you’re wearing make up. Lengthens and doesn’t clump for long natural looking lashes. Love it and have been a fan for years!
customer_reviews.author: J. Snarr

customer_reviews.title: Not very useable
customer_reviews.text: Every time my wife gets these they are very dry. They seem old or not stored well. Unfortunately she is not willing to buy this anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Samsquanch

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy but does the trick. I used to use this stuff after discovering it as a bathroom freebie at a wedding, then dabbled in $25 mascaras at Sephora for a few years. I just ran out of Milk Makeup Kush mascara and thought I’d see if this still holds up. I think it does! (Especially for six or seven bucks.)
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To
customer_reviews.text: This mascara has been my go-to for at least 15 years. I have tried a lot of different mascaras over the years, and always come back to this one. It goes on smoothly, gives me the length and volume I want, and isn’t over-the-top goopy or fibrous. It doesn’t cause trouble with my contacts or irritate my eyes like some eye makeup does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: I had googled the best hypo-allergenic massacre (because my eyes are so sensitive) and this was one of the ones that came up. Since I didn't want to waste any more money trying mascares and throwing them away, (and it was a good price) I gave it a try. It doesn't irritate my eyes, and stays on all day. Best I've found so far and at a great value.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for year. I just prefer to purchase it on here because the price is better and I like the subscribe and save option so I don't have to think about when I need to change out my mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Holly S.

customer_reviews.title: Good basic mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite old stand-by mascara. I sometimes use it as a base layer because it removes easily, and doesn't make my lashes "crunchy!"
customer_reviews.author: rep663

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me!
customer_reviews.text: I like this mascara because it makes my lashes look fuller and longer without all that clumping that so many other mascaras do now - on purpose. I know that if you put enough of the other type of mascara on it makes your eyes more noticeable, but I don't like all that clumping so I have to comb through my lashes over and over. I just don't care for that heavy look - this mascara is light but really makes a difference. I wear contacts and it doesn't bother my eyes at all.
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated Mom

customer_reviews.title: Gave it a try
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. The mascara was on the dry side from the first time I used it. Don’t know the age of the product I was sent.. but it’s definitely not fresh. And by midday, it does leave “black dots” under your eyes.. and on cheeks.
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Mascara
customer_reviews.text: It's the only mascara that I have used for years. For me, it's the only mascara that doesn't weigh down my eyelashes. I like to curl my eyelashes and when I use other products my eyelashes droop down upon application. NOT THIS ONE! & the bonus is that it really is waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Full 'n soft is right
customer_reviews.text: This does smudge a bit more than I'd like under the eyes as the day goes by, but it is still the best mascara I've tried. My lashes look very natural and not clumpy/weighed down whatsoever with this mascara. It makes my lashes look long and fluttery. I get why they call it full 'n soft because you do get a nice soft feathery look with this mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Christina P.

customer_reviews.title: Love This Mascara!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mascara right now! I can't walk into work with overdone eyelashes so this makes them stand out without looking thick and clumpy. It also doesn't flake at all and I can take it all off when washing my face!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very good mascara
customer_reviews.text: I have only recently discovered this mascara and I like it very much. It's perfect for naturally longer but thin lashes, it's quite black and I don't need to apply innumerable layers to make my light brown lashes intense black. It doesn't crumble and it's easy to wash off. What else to ask?) The only downside is that I live in a hot climate and it does sometimes leave some traces under my lower lashes (which are long and maybe that's the readon) but it's not that critical. It's really a pity that Amazon doesn't ship it anymore internationally.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: No longer in stores.
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to be able to purchase this on Amazon as I couldn’t find it in the stores any longer. The brush is excellent as it provides full even coverage without clumps. A miracle. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lorac Sotna

customer_reviews.title: Worst mascara ever!
customer_reviews.text: This mascara definitely is the worst I have ever purchased. When applied looked as though I had very little mascara on if any at all on then it dried and ended up underneath my eyes, dried granules.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Have used this mascara for 10+ years and love it
customer_reviews.text: Every time I try a different brand or even another option under the Maybelline name, I am instantly reminded of why I use this product and have for 10+ years. The waterproof aspect is perfect. Products say they are waterproof but this mascara really is. I have allergy eyes and there are many times when any kind of fan on me makes my eyes water. This happens a lot throughout the day and I need something that can stand up to that. The "soft" aspect of the mascara is not just in the name. It feels softer to the touch than other mascaras and, to me, that means it's gentler on my lashes. I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kae

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mascara for a couple of years so there were no surprises as far as the product was concerned, but the price was about half of what I normally pay at CVS, so I bought 4 tubes for the price of 2, and paying less for something is never a bad thing! And, the fact that it arrived in 2 days and I didn't have to go to the drug store was just another bonus:)
customer_reviews.author: Shelley M.

product_meta.title: Maybelline New York Full 'n Soft Waterproof Mascara Makeup, Very Black, 2 Count
product_meta.description: Size:2 Count| Color:Waterproof very blackNourished with Vitamin E, this advanced thickening formula creates full and healthy-looking lashes that are silky-soft. The Quick Dissolve System allows for quick and easy mascara removal to help prevent lash loss. Ophthalmologist tested. Hypoallergenic tested. Suitable for contact lens wearers.
feature_bullets: Hypoallergenic, advanced thickening formula with vitamin E to create softer and fuller-looking lashes
Waterproof mascara available in super-saturated shade Very Black for a bold, fearless look all day long
Full ‘N Soft waterproof volumizing mascara is suitable for contact lens wearers and is ophthalmologist tested
Features Quick Dissolve System that allows for quick and easy mascara removal leaving silky-soft lashes
Helps prevent eyelashes from falling out and delivers healthy-looking lashes after every application

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
